data.lyric:
[ti:Easy (Remix)]
[ar:DaniLeigh/Chris Brown]
[al:Easy (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.37]Easy (Remix) - DaniLeigh/Chris Brown
[00:01.29]Lyrics by：Danielle Curiel/Christopher Allen Clark/Fallon King/Mathias Sorum/Ronald M. Ferebee Jr./Chris Brown
[00:03.74]Composed by：Danielle Curiel/Christopher Allen Clark/Fallon King/Mathias Sorum/Ronald M. Ferebee Jr./Chris Brown
[00:07.22]DaniLeigh：
[00:17.55]Yeah yeah
[00:19.26]DaniLeigh：
[00:19.40]Let me catch ya vibe let's just take our time
[00:24.00]Just relax your mind and take it easy
[00:28.80]Don't have to decide you do I do I
[00:33.57]Don't have to be mine let's take it easy
[00:38.16]DaniLeigh：
[00:38.39]D**n we so fi' bae
[00:40.17]Whippin' through the 305 highway
[00:42.61]Love it how you ride in the fast lane
[00:44.91]Make me wanna say that's my babe yeah
[00:48.13]Dani gotta behave gotta be chill like a Sunday
[00:52.33]Never wanna look too thirsty
[00:54.64]But your drip got me feeling wavy
[00:56.65]DaniLeigh：
[00:56.97]Make you feel lucky lucky
[00:59.44]Make you wanna love me love me
[01:01.80]Baby when you with me with me
[01:04.22]Got no worries worries
[01:06.64]I love it when you touch me touch me
[01:09.02]Feelin' so lovely lovely
[01:11.42]Make me wanna love me love me
[01:13.88]Make me feel lucky lucky
[01:15.87]DaniLeigh/Chris Brown：
[01:17.06]Let me catch ya vibe let's just take our time
[01:21.56]Just relax your mind and take it easy
[01:26.43]Don't have to decide you do I do I
[01:31.21]Don't have to be mine let's take it easy
[01:35.81]DaniLeigh/Chris Brown：
[01:36.11]Hey yeah
[01:39.31]And take it easy
[01:40.78]Hey
[01:42.28]Chris Brown：
[01:45.32]When you pull up on my side babe
[01:47.40]Speedin' down that 101 highway
[01:49.78]Movin' too fast couldn't see the place
[01:52.21]But you see that look on my face so you know what it is
[01:55.31]Pedal to the metal all gas no brake
[01:57.59]Girl I would never get in your way
[01:59.77]I'ma shut up and let you drive
[02:02.12]Put that thing to the floor one for the road
[02:04.33]DaniLeigh/Chris Brown：
[02:04.71]Make you feel lucky lucky
[02:06.17]Lucky
[02:06.62]Make you wanna love me love me
[02:09.02]Baby when you with me with me
[02:11.02]Right here
[02:11.60]Got no worries worries
[02:13.46]Worries oh no
[02:13.99]I love it when you touch me touch me
[02:16.26]Feelin' so lovely lovely
[02:18.22]I love it
[02:18.79]Make me wanna love me love me
[02:20.71]Ooh
[02:21.07]Make me feel lucky lucky
[02:22.60]Oh no baby
[02:23.81]DaniLeigh/Chris Brown：
[02:24.09]Let me catch ya vibe let's just take our time
[02:28.76]Just relax your mind and take it easy
[02:33.61]Don't have to decide you do I do I
[02:38.38]Don't have to be mine let's take it easy
[02:42.89]DaniLeigh/Chris Brown：
[02:43.30]Hey yeah
[02:46.64]And take it easy
[02:48.04]Hey
[02:51.15]Let's take it easy
[02:52.79]Hey yeah
[02:55.99]And take it easy
[02:57.62]Hey
data.trans:
[ti:Easy (Remix)]
[ar:DaniLeigh/Chris Brown]
[al:Easy (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.37]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.29]//
[00:03.74]//
[00:07.22]//
[00:17.55]//
[00:19.26]//
[00:19.40]让我凝神感受你的气息 我们尽情享受悠悠时光
[00:24.00]放逐心灵 脚步轻盈 
[00:28.80]不必急切做出决定 彼此舒心 
[00:33.57]不必马上给我答案 我们细水长流 
[00:38.16]//
[00:38.39]宝贝 我们如此惬意
[00:40.17]我们贯穿305公路 行云流水般畅通无阻   
[00:42.61]高速路段你大展身手的样子让我痴迷
[00:44.91]让我忍不住想拍手称快 那可是我家的宝贝 
[00:48.13]Dani要矜持 要高冷 像周日约会那样张弛有度  
[00:52.33]不要一副寂寞难耐的样子
[00:54.64]但你英姿飒爽的风度 真让我心神荡漾
[00:56.65]//
[00:56.97]得让你对我刮目相看 得到我便如获至宝 
[00:59.44]得让你对我心生爱慕 
[01:01.80]宝贝 你和我在一起的时候
[01:04.22]我便无忧无虑 如沐春风
[01:06.64]我爱你温柔的轻抚
[01:09.02]感觉如此撩拨心弦
[01:11.42]让我觉得自己都更惹人爱怜了
[01:13.88]让我觉得如此幸运
[01:15.87]//
[01:17.06]让我凝神感受你的气息 我们尽情享受悠悠时光
[01:21.56]放逐心灵 脚步轻盈
[01:26.43]不必急切做出决定 彼此舒心 
[01:31.21]不必马上给我答案 我们细水长流 
[01:35.81]//
[01:36.11]//
[01:39.31]细水长流 缓步慢行
[01:40.78]//
[01:42.28]//
[01:45.32]宝贝当你驱车来接我
[01:47.40]在101公路上加速疾驰
[01:49.78]快如闪电 目不见物
[01:52.21]但你留意到我的表情 知我所想
[01:55.31]油门一踩到底 再无顾虑
[01:57.59]我永远不会对你横加阻拦 
[01:59.77]我会安静噤声 任你驰骋如风
[02:02.12]不顾一切 一路随你畅行 
[02:04.33]//
[02:04.71]让你对我刮目相看 得到我便如获至宝 
[02:06.17]如获至宝般幸运
[02:06.62]让你对我心生爱慕
[02:09.02]宝贝 你和我在一起的时候
[02:11.02]在那一刻
[02:11.60]我便无忧无虑 如沐春风
[02:13.46]我便无忧无虑 如沐春风
[02:13.99]我爱你温柔的轻抚
[02:16.26]感觉如此撩拨心弦
[02:18.22]难掩欢喜
[02:18.79]让我觉得自己都更惹人爱怜了
[02:20.71]//
[02:21.07]让我觉得如此幸运
[02:22.60]哦 不 宝贝
[02:23.81]//
[02:24.09]让我凝神感受你的气息 我们尽情享受悠悠时光
[02:28.76]放逐心灵 脚步轻盈
[02:33.61]不必急切做出决定 彼此舒心 
[02:38.38]不必马上给我答案 我们细水长流 
[02:42.89]//
[02:43.30]//
[02:46.64]细水长流 缓步慢行
[02:48.04]//
[02:51.15]我们细水长流
[02:52.79]//
[02:55.99]细水长流 缓步慢行
[02:57.62]//
